Suppressing warning and messages JUST for this code chunk

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)

```

Running code but not showing code OR output
```{r}
#| include: false
# return first 6 lines of starwars data
head(starwars)

#return dimensions of starwars table
dim(starwars)
```

Showing output, but not code.
```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false

ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = height, y = mass, color = mass)) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs (x = "Height in cm", y = "Mass in Kg")


```

Show only code and output
```{r}
#| warning: false
ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = height)) +
  geom_histogram(color = "purple", fill = "gold")


```
